title: Abilities wont go off.
body:
So this has happened for the for the last few games, Start game and I play with smart cast on and sometimes when I hit my summoner spells they don't go off. Like to use flash sometimes i have to sit there and hit it over 5 times for it to do anything, and that goes with the other abilities as well. it works most of the time if I press the button and hold it down and then release. But everytime I hit the button, the sound plays when you press an abilitiy. Just sometimes they don't go off... HALp

I tried repairing/ reinstalling
riots keyboard and mouse trouble shooting ideas.
I can't find any suggestions online on what to do.
any help will be appreciated

replies.body:
Given you have tried multiple different troubleshooting steps already, I would like to rule out packet loss on your connection as a possible root cause.  Essentially, when you press the key you are telling the server to execute a command, but if that packet of information never reaches it, then nothing will happen. This would also explain why hitting it 5 times will cause it to go off normally.

To rule this out, make sure to use our [Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader).  It will let you know if you have any packet loss, or any other connection issues as well as steps you should take.

Let me know if you have any further questions!

I have the same problem but I don't experience any kind of packet loss, lag, or connectivity issues while playing. I have a packet loss of 0.06%. I've been experiencing this for quite a few patches now and I need help because It's extremely annoying while I'm playing and my spells and abilities don't go off.
